title: Dozens of new mobile apps are coming to cars with Google built-in.
description: Starting this week, cars with Google built-in will get dozens of new apps to enjoy while parked.This launch is part of our car ready mobile apps program, which we introdâ€¦
author: Vivek RadhakrishnanTechnical Program ManagerAndroid
excerpt: Starting this week, cars with Google built-in will get dozens of new apps to enjoy while parked.This launch is part of our car ready mobile apps program, which we introduced last year to make it easier for developers to distribute their large-screen-optimized mobile apps to car screens.Whether you're waiting at a charging station or in line at school pickup, you'll be able to stay entertained with popular streaming and gaming apps like Farm Heroes Saga and more.Availability will begin with select Volvo cars and Polestar models and more makes and models coming soon. Check out the full list of apps on the Google Play Store.
text: Starting this week, cars with Google built-in will get dozens of new apps to enjoy while parked.This launch is part of our car ready mobile apps program, which we introduced last year to make it easier for developers to distribute their large-screen-optimized mobile apps to car screens.Whether you're waiting at a charging station or in line at school pickup, you'll be able to stay entertained with popular streaming and gaming apps like Farm Heroes Saga and more.Availability will begin with select Volvo cars and Polestar models and more makes and models coming soon. Check out the full list of apps on the Google Play Store.
html:
Starting this week, cars with Google built-in will get dozens of new apps to enjoy while parked.

This launch is part of our car ready mobile apps program, which we introduced last year to make it easier for developers to distribute their large-screen-optimized mobile apps to car screens.

Whether you're waiting at a charging station or in line at school pickup, you'll be able to stay entertained with popular streaming and gaming apps like Farm Heroes Saga and more.

Availability will begin with select Volvo cars and Polestar models and more makes and models coming soon. Check out the full list of apps on the Google Play Store.
